text: @senatemajldr trump fired our Global Pandemic Response team, buried 2 reports stating we weren't ready, knew in Jan that Coronavirus was here and did nothing, suppressed testing to keep numbers down, has been exposed and refuses to get tested. You stood by and did nothing. You will lose in Nov
